title: Google Clone
subtitle: A display of HTML CSS Skillset
summary: Inspired by The Giant of the Web(Google). Here's a simple clone of the website. Google’s mission is to organize the world’s information and make it universally accessible and useful.

title: Job Seeker Clone
subtitle: A display of HTML CSS and Responsiveness
summary: Clone of an Arabic JOb Seeking website, adding the responsive feature, to render awesomely on mobile devices

title: Hot or Cold App
subtitle: Simple Javascript Game
summary: SImple game built with javascript, that allows a user to make guesses. If the user is close to the random hidden number 'he is hot' otherwise 'he is cold'

title: Shopping App
subtitle: A simple TODO App
summary: This application is built with pure Javascript that displays a functionality of a simple todo application

title: Sound Bounce
subtitle: Consumes Soundclouds and Webhose's API
summary: With the service of soundcloud, a user can search for songs of their choice and listen online, with an option to download, if its downloadable, while the Webhose helps to fetch news related to the search

title: instaMe
subtitle: Powered by Instagram
summary: InstaMe is an application which uses instagrams api to display photos related to your search. This app only fetches by tag names, you can visit back later for a version that searches by username.
